name: HITOTSU NO MORI
description:
■Players can "mix" items to create powerful ones.
■There are 3 kind of "Ghosts", "Nen-oni", "Beast-oni" and "Wraith".
■During battle, you can gather great strength by "Guarding".
■Gaining "Purging Points" by taking down enemies. You can upgrade yourself using them but since the enemies won't respawn, it's better to use them wisely.
